typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VAActors
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FCActors
FCActors, VAActors union(byName: true)~> MergeVAFC
MergeVAFC derive(ActorID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		ActorName = case(isNull(ActorName),'Unknown Actor Name',ActorName),
		Gender = case(isNull(Gender),'U',Gender)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 keyGenerate(output(ActorSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
